DOC.detailed_description: The benefit low flow anesthesia economic , less pollution , heat humidity preservation require appropriate wash-in phase . The current wash-in protocol complicate time consume . We propose new 1-1-12 desflurane wash-in protocol simple predictable . The objective study identify time achieve alveolar concentration desflurane 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 6 % 1-1-12 wash-in protocol . All patient receive iv propofol 2 mg/kg induction agent succinyl choline 1.5 mg/kg intubation . Then ventilation control achieve end-tidal CO2 30-35 mmHg O2 : N2O 1:1 L/min desflurane 12 % . Time achieve alveolar concentration desflurane 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 6 % record analyze . After , concentration desflurane anesthetic technique adjust requirement anesthesiologist .
